role_dependencies: Installs Java on nearly any OS
Ensures Snap is installed on Linux systems
role_description: An Ansible role that populates the environment variables with Secrets/Keys
role_description_full_overview: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that sets up environment variables containing sensitive information like Keys and Secrets. This is done using `envconsul` which can fetch secrets from Hashicorp Consul and Vault.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that sets up environment variables containing sensitive information like Keys and Secrets.
